alert.note: Alert for Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 5:54PM EDT until May 31 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Pasco County in west central Florida... North central Pinellas County in west central Florida... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 554 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Port Richey, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Port Richey, Jasmine Estates, Trinity, New Port Richey East, Crystal Beach, Elfers, Beacon Square, Holiday, Palm Harbor and East Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
